job_history.work_description: Directly report to the CEO and VP of a 65-year old real estate property management company. Accountable for the day-to-day operations functions of: HR, administration and technology with direct supervision of two staff members.

job_history.role_name: Vice President and Director of Human Resources and Administration
job_history.work_description: Reported directly to the Founder/CEO of this fast-growing, start-up Healthcare/IT Company established in 2000. As a proven strategic business partner, was instrumental in growing the company from 45 employees located in eight (8) states to 215 employees located in 32 states and Puerto Rico.

A management level role with overall responsibility of office operations for a 21-person law firm. Day-to- day responsibilities included all aspects of Human Resources, Finance, Administration and IT.

Worked daily side-by-side and reported to the Director of the DC office. Effectively administered and grew office talent from 18 to over 120 employees as well as, annual income growth from $1.3M to $37M and an annual payroll and benefits budget of over $12M.

skills.name: Human Resources Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in HR management, having supervised staff members and been accountable for day-to-day operations of HR functions across multiple companies, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has held various leadership roles, including Director of HR, Vice President and Director of Human Resources and Administration, and Business Manager, demonstrating expert-level leadership skills.

skills.name: Administration
skills.explanation: Has managed administrative responsibilities in multiple companies, including office operations, finance, and IT, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Business Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing business operations, including finance, HR, and administration, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
skills.explanation: Has been instrumental in growing companies, including a start-up, from a small number of employees to a large team, suggesting strong proficiency in strategic planning.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Has supervised and managed teams of varying sizes, including a team of 215 employees, indicating strong proficiency in team management.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Has managed financial responsibilities, including payroll and benefits budgets, but the extent of experience is not as clear as other skills, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: IT Management
skills.explanation: Has managed IT responsibilities, but the extent of experience is not as clear as other skills, suggesting some practical experience.
